body:
I believe that maps in the should be open to the public as they would allow people to scrim on Avicus maps such as Senex etc. As since the server rotations are massive(thanks staff!) you only play maps like Luar and Senex once every so often.

Pros
  • Would allow teams to prepare better for tourney's (scrimming,working out defenses etc.)
  • Would allow people to show slight enhancements to maps that would be otherwise previously quite difficult
Cons
I can't think of any. 

P.S I made this thread because I wanted to write XML for these maps that teams could use in conjunction to SporkPGM to scrim on thanks!
